title: THE LOVER'S TOUNGE-A MERRY ROMP THE LANGUAGE OF LOVE AND SEX
description:
<a href="http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/1267/24168616.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/1267/24168616.jpg</a>



The Lover's Tongue: A Merry Romp Through the Language of Love and Sex


2004 | 

240 pages | 

ISBN:1894663519 | 

PDF | 

14.45 Mb 




This delightful book includes over one hundred mini-essays explaining the
origins and historical development of words in our language that pertain
to love and sex. Do you know, for example, what a 78 is? Here's a hint: like
the old 78 rpm records, the term refers to a man who is . . . well, on the
fast side!...........................
